Applicant : McSweeney , Theresa
School (district) : Boise School District DSC Digital Support Specialist  (Boise Independent School District )
Role(s) : digital support specialist ;
LinkedIn Profile : I built the Farm to School website for the State of Idaho last year in my externship.  I actively manage several websites for organizations and nonprofits that I work with.  I am highly interested in lesson design, remote education, and anything tech - especially in ag and water!  I am most eager to be able to learn how technology that students use can integrate into their daily lives as they begin looking for jobs.  

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I have done this program 2 years in a row and have learned so much about how our world works when it comes to STEM.  I am able to communicate with all stakeholders about different facets of STEM that I learn about when in the summer roles; it has been eye-opening and life changing for me.  
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Remote
	* Hybrid

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* Life Science / Biology
	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
